chamber_of_commerce_articles.title: Workshop: SME Financing 2025
chamber_of_commerce_articles.description: An intensive workshop for SME owners to learn how to optimize cash flow and access the new credit lines offered by Banco de Córdoba.

chamber_of_commerce_articles.title: Commercial Observatory: Consumption Trends Report
chamber_of_commerce_articles.description: Presentation of the latest data on consumer behavior and profitability in the Central Area, with projections and trends for the final quarter.
chamber_of_commerce_articles.location: Stock Exchange Main Auditorium - Av. Vélez Sarsfield 280.

chamber_of_commerce_articles.title: Seminar: Exporting Knowledge Economy Services
chamber_of_commerce_articles.description: A seminar focused on Córdoba's tech industry. A practical guide on requirements, logistics, and financing for exporting software and consulting services.
chamber_of_commerce_articles.location: Innovation Co-Work Space - Av. Colón 1500, Cofico.

chamber_of_commerce_articles.title: Working Breakfast: Labor Reform and Hiring
chamber_of_commerce_articles.description: An exclusive meeting for members with a specialist lawyer, analyzing the most recent changes in labor regulations and their impact on personnel management.
chamber_of_commerce_articles.location: “La Cañada” Executive Lounge - Fray Mamerto Esquiú 125.

chamber_of_commerce_articles.title: Business Round: 'Cuyo-Central' Regional Linkage
chamber_of_commerce_articles.description: A networking event designed to connect Córdoba entrepreneurs with peers from Mendoza and San Juan, seeking strategic alliances and new distribution channels.
chamber_of_commerce_articles.location: Córdoba Convention Center - Av. Carcano s/n, Predio Ferial.

chamber_of_commerce_articles.title: Webinar: Post-Pandemic Digital Marketing Strategies
chamber_of_commerce_articles.description: An online session on social media strategies, e-commerce, and segmented advertising, crucial for maintaining relevance and sales in the current digital environment.
chamber_of_commerce_articles.location: Online Format (Zoom) - Pre-Registration Required on the Website.

chamber_of_commerce_articles.title: “My Sustainable Business” Certification Program
chamber_of_commerce_articles.description: A mentorship and evaluation program to help businesses implement waste management and energy efficiency practices, earning an official sustainability seal.
chamber_of_commerce_articles.location: Productive Development Agency (Fictional) - 27 de Abril 750, Of. 301.

chamber_of_commerce_articles.title: Discussion Panel: Challenges for Young Entrepreneurs
chamber_of_commerce_articles.description: Monthly meeting for the Young Entrepreneurs Commission. Discussion on obstacles to accessing initial capital and local development policies.
chamber_of_commerce_articles.location: “El Central” Historic Café - San Jerónimo 450, Centro.
